rooms.name: Entrance Hallway
rooms.description: A spacious entrance with a foyer that leads into the main living areas. Incorporates a waiting area and cloakroom.

rooms.name: Garage
rooms.description: Two-car garage integrated on the ground floor, ensuring convenient vehicle access with ample space for parking and storage.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: A dedicated guest bedroom designed to maximize natural light through windows aligned per Vastu principles. Also includes an attached bathroom.

rooms.name: Living & Dining Area
rooms.description: Open-plan area with a spacious living room and dining space that promotes social interaction, natural ventilation, and ample daylighting as per local building norms.

rooms.name: Kitchenette
rooms.description: Compact kitchen integrated within the open area for convenience while maintaining distinct boundaries. Designed to encourage natural light with windows on one side.

rooms.name: Service Area
rooms.description: Small utility room including laundry and storage, positioned adjacent to the kitchen for operational efficiency.

openings.description: The main entrance door is designed to be inviting and adheres to local building norms.
Large side windows installed to maximize natural light and ventilation in the living space.
Double sliding doors for ease of access between the garage and the external driveway.
